Title: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
Product: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Bilbo Baggins

Text: The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins.
Bilbo Baggins cannot gain resources from player card effects.
If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players lose the game.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Bilbo Baggins

Text: Bilbo Baggins does not count against the hero limit and cannot gain resources from non-treasure cards.
The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins.
Action: Spend 1 Baggins resource to search your deck for a treasure card and add it to your hand.
If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players have lost the game.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Glamdring

Text: Attach to a hero or Gandalf.
Attached character gets +2 Attack.
Response: After attached character destroys an Orc enemy, draw 1 card.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Sting

Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Bilbo Baggins gets +1 Willpower, +1 Attack, and +1 Defense.
Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the discarded card`s Threat.
Front.FlavorText: `I shall call you Sting.` -Bilbo, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Orcrist

Text: Attach to a hero.
Attached character gets +2 Attack.Response: After attached hero destroys an Orc enemy, add 1 resource to that hero`s resource pool.
Front.FlavorText: `This, Thorin, the runes name Orcrist, the Goblin-cleaver in the ancient tongue of Gondolin; it was a famous blade.` -Elrond, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

AllCards.Title: Bilbo's Magic Ring

Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Action: Exhaust Bilbo`s Magic Ring and raise your threat by 1 to gain 1 Baggins resource. (Limit once per round.)
Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend an attack, exhaust Bilbo`s Magic Ring and raise your threat by 3 to cancel all damage from this attack.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Mithril Shirt

Text: Attach to Bilbo Baggins.
Attached hero gets +1 Defense and +1 hit point.
Front.FlavorText:
`Mr. Baggins!` he cried. `Here is the first payment of your reward! Cast off your old coat and put on this!`
-Thorin, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Thrór's Golden Cup

Text: Attach to a hero.
Action: Add Thror`s Golden Cup to the victory display to draw 3 cards.
Front.FlavorText:
...the great golden cup of Thror, two-handed, hammered and carven with birds and flowers whose eyes and petals were of jewels...
-The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Thrór's Hunting Bow

Text: Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached hero gains Ranged.
When making a ranged attack, attached hero gets +2 Attack.
Front.FlavorText:
Thorin seized a bow of horn and shot an arrow at the speaker.
-The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: The Arkenstone

Text: Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust The Arkenstone and raise your threat by X to lower by X the cost of the next ally you play this phase that matches the attached hero`s sphere.
Front.FlavorText:
`...the Heart of the Mountain; and it is also the heart of Thorin. He values it above a rive of gold.`
-Bilbo, The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: Thrór's Battle Axe

Text: Attach to a hero. Restricted.
Attached hero gets +2 Attack.
Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, deal 1 damage to another enemy engaged with you.
Front.FlavorText:
Royal indeed did Thorin look, clad in a coat of gold-plated rings, with a silver hafted axe...
-The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

AllCards.Title: A Deep Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Willpower without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: A Foul Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the most attachments without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: A Large Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed hit points without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: A Nice Pickle

Text: When Revealed: Place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is equal to twice the number of players in the game.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: A Smelly Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the ally (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed cost without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: A Strong Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Attack without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: A Suspicious Crow

Text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the encounter discard pile and add it to the staging area, if able.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack deals at least 1 damage, shuffle this card back into the encounter deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: Western Lands

AllCards.Title: A Tough Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Defense without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: A Worn Sack

Text: When Sacked: Attach to hero with the most resources without a Sack attached.Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: An Unexpected Party

Text: Setup: Remove and shuffle the 7 Sack cards into a Sack deck and set it aside face down. Remove the 3 Troll enemies and the Troll Cave from the encounter deck and set them aside out of play. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. Each player reveals 1 card from the top of the encounter deck and adds it to the staging area.
Front.FlavorText: The wizard Gandalf has chosen Bilbo Baggins to join Thorin and company on their quest to the Lonley Mountain.

Back.FlavorText: At first they had passed through hobbit-lands, a wild respectable country inhabited by decent folk, with good roads, an inn or two, and now and then, a dwarf or a farmer ambling by on business. Then they came to lands where people spoke strangely, and sang songs Bilbo had never heard before. - The Hobbit.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Bert

Text: Players cannot play attachment cards on Troll enemies.
Forced: After Bert engages a player, sack 1.
Forced: Return Bert to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Cave Entrance

Text: While Cave Entrance is in the staging area, it gains: `Forced: At the end of the round, place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game.`

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: Western Lands

AllCards.Title: Dawn Take You All

Front.FlavorText: `Dawn take you all, and be stone to you!` said a voice that sounded like William`s but it wasn`t. For just at that moment the light came over the hill, and there was a mighty twitter in the branches. William never spoke for he stood turned to stone as he stooped; and Bert and Tom were stuck like rocks as they looked at him. -The Hobbit

Text:
When Revealed: Remove all Troll enemies and Sack cards from the game. If Troll Cave is in the victory display, the players have discovered the treasure cards Sting, Glamdring, and Orcrist.

The players have won the game.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Dreary Hills

Text: Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Dreary Hills, each player must discard 1 card at random from his hand.
Response: After Dreary Hills leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: Western Lands

AllCards.Title: Hobbit-lands

Text: Response: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Hobbit-lands, the first player draws 1 card.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must put the top card of the encounter deck discard pile on top of the encounter deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Hungry Troll

Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a Troll enemy in the staging area and engages that enemy. If there are no Troll enemies in the staging area, this card gains Surge.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 4 damage to each character with a Sack card attached. (The first player may spend 2 Baggins resources to cancel this effect.)

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Lone-Lands

Text: Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Lone-Lands, each player removes 1 resource from one of his hero`s resource pools, if able.
Response: After Lone-Lands leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: Western Lands

AllCards.Title: Lots or None at All

Text: When Revealed: If there is a Troll enemy in the staging area, Sack 1. If there are no Troll enemies in the staging area, this card gains Doomed 2.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: If the attacking enemy is a Troll, Sack 1. (The first player may spend 1 Baggins resource to cancel this effect.)

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: More Like a Grocer

Text: When Revealed: Discard all Baggins resources.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Resolve this card`s `When Revealed` effect.
Front.FlavorText: `As soon as I clapped eyes on the little fellow bobbing and puffing on the mat, I had my doubts. He looks more like a grocer than a burglar!` -Glóin The Hobbit

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: Western Lands

AllCards.Title: No Campfire

Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose one: increase his threat by 4, or reveal an additional encounter card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: The defending player raises his threat by 2.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: Western Lands

AllCards.Title: Roast 'Em or Boil 'Em?

Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each ally. (2 damage instead if there is a Troll enemy in the staging area.)
Front.Shadow: Shadow: Search the encounter deck for Troll Camp and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Roast Mutton

Text: When Revealed: Add the set-aside Troll enemies and the Troll Cave to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.
Front.FlavorText: Obviously trolls. Even Bilbo, in spite of his sheltered life, could see that: from the great heavy faces of them, and their size, and the shape of their legs, not to mention their language, which was not drawing-room fashion at all - The Hobbit

Text: Forced: If there are no Troll enemies left in play, or if there are no cards left in the encounter deck, advance it to the next stage.

Any time players would place progress tokens on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead. (Progress is placed on the active location before triggering this effect.)

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Tom

Text: Troll enemies can only be attacked by one character at a time.
Forced: After Tom engages a player, sack 1.
Forced: Return Tom to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Troll Camp

Text: While Troll Camp is in the staging area, Troll enemies get +1 Threat for each player in the game.

While Troll Camp is in play, Bilbo Baggins gains: `Action: Exhaust Bilbo Baggins and spend 1 Baggins resource to remove 1 Sack card from a character. Bilbo Baggins may trigger this effect even with a Sack card attached to him.`

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Troll Cave

Text: Immune to player card effects.

Players cannot travel to Troll Cave unless Bilbo Baggins has the Troll Key attached and the first player spends 5 Baggins resources. (2 Baggins resources instead if Bilbo Baggins has the Troll Purse attached.)

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Troll Purse

Text: If Troll Purse is discarded, add it to the staging area.
If Troll Purse is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Troll enemy, if able.
Response: After attached Troll enemy is destroyed, the first player may spend 1 Baggins resource to claim this objective and attach it to Bilbo Baggins.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Troll Key

Text: If Troll Key is discarded, add it to the staging area. If Troll Key is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Troll enemy, if able.
Response: After attached Troll enemy takes damage as the result of an attack, the first player may exhaust Bilbo Baggins to claim this objective and attach it to him.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: William

Text: Troll enemies not engaged with a player cannot take damage.
Forced: After William engages a player, sack 2.
Forced: Return William to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day

AllCards.Title: Wind-whipped Rain

Text: When Revealed: Discard all non-treasure, non-objective attachments in play.
Front.Shadow: Shadow: The defending character gets -1 Defense.

AllCards.CardSet: The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill

EncounterInfo.EncounterSet: Western Lands
